titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3004) to improve the reliability of the Nation's electric transmission system.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3004) to improve the reliability of the Nation's electric transmission system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Bishop (NY). Petition No: 108-10.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3004 (Electric Reliability Improvement Act of 2003).
